NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Poultry and Regulations or the cell corresponding to Soil Health and Technology Adoption?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Crops and Sustainability or the cell corresponding to Poultry and Technology Adoption?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Poultry} and {Technology Adoption} has a higher heat value.
